summary.span: 异步关闭 对象。

span.span: Asynchronously closes the object.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项, 并返回`Task`已完成的, 这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `Task`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Dispose` 完成后`DisposeAsync` , 调用或。 Call `Dispose` or `DisposeAsync` when you've finished using the . 调用这些方法之一会使处于不可用状态。Calling one of these methods leaves the in an unusable state. 释放后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 这样垃圾回收器才能收回占用的内存。 After disposing, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在释放对的最后一个引用之前, 始终释放。Always dispose before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 异步释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Asynchronously releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.
A representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Dispose` 完成后`DisposeAsync` , 调用或。 Call `Dispose` or `DisposeAsync` when you've finished using the . 调用这些方法之一会使处于不可用状态。Calling one of these methods leaves the in an unusable state. 释放后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 这样垃圾回收器才能收回占用的内存。 After disposing, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在释放对的最后一个引用之前, 始终释放。Always dispose before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method. 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项, 并返回`ValueTask`已完成的, 这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `ValueTask`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回一个枚举器，可用于循环访问数据读取器中的行。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

returns.span: 一个枚举器，可用于循环访问数据读取器中的行。

span.span: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管可以使用此方法来检索显式构造函数, 但在支持显式**foreach**构造的语言中, 直接使用循环构造来循环访问数据读取器中的行更为简单。Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit constructor, in languages that support an explicit **foreach** construct, it is simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader. 如果实现此方法, 则它应返回的新实例, 或确保枚举器返回对象。If you implement this method, it should return a new instance of or ensure that your enumerator returns objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!T> GetFieldValueAsync<T>(int32 ordinal) cil managed
Public Function GetFieldValueAsync(Of T) (ordinal As Integer) As Task(Of T)

span.span: The type of the value to be returned.
The zero-based column ordinal.

summary.span: 异步获取指定列的值作为请求的类型。

span.span: Asynchronously gets the value of the specified column as the requested type.

returns.span: 包含指定列的值的任务。

span.span: A task whose contains the value of the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当在顺序模式下创建读取器时, 才需要此异步方法来避免阻塞调用线程。This asynchronous method is only needed to avoid blocking the calling thread when the reader is created in sequential mode. 如果未指定顺序模式, 则每次 ReadAsync 完成时, 所有列值都将在内存中可用, 并且调用该方法的同步版本不应阻止调用线程。If sequential mode isn't specified, all column values should become available in memory each time ReadAsync completes, and calling the synchronous version of the method shouldn't block the calling thread. 此异步方法的默认实现调用其同步对应项, 并返回已完成的任务, 可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method invokes its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed Task, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 当返回任务还未完成时， DbDataReader 对象的其他方法和属性不应调用 。Other methods and properties of the DbDataReader object should not be invoked while the returned Task is not yet completed.

exception.span: 在数据检索期间删除或关闭连接。

span.span: The connection was dropped or closed during data retrieval.
-or-

exception.span: 在数据检索期间关闭数据读取器。

span.span: The data reader was closed during the data retrieval.
-or-

exception.span: 没有可读取的数据（例如尚未调用第一个 ，或调用返回了 ）。

span.span: There is no data ready to be read (for example, the first hasn't been called, or it returned ).
-or-

exception.span: 按顺序模式尝试读取上一步骤中读取的列。

span.span: Tried to read a previously-read column in sequential mode.
-or-

exception.span: 没有正在进行的异步操作。

span.span: There was an asynchronous operation in progress.

exception.span: 以顺序模式运行时，这适用于所有 Get_\*_ 方法，读取流时也可对其进行调用。

span.span: This applies to all Get_\*_ methods when running in sequential mode, as they could be called while reading a stream.
The column index is out of range.

exception.span: 数据库返回的值不匹配或不能转换为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Threading.Tasks.Task<T> GetFieldValueAsync<T> (int ordinal, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!T> GetFieldValueAsync<T>(int32 ordinal, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

abstract member GetFieldValueAsync : int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'T> override this.GetFieldValueAsync : int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'T>

span.span: The type of the value to be returned.
The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用于取消异步操作的令牌。

span.span: A token to cancel the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 异步获取指定列的值作为请求的类型。

span.span: Asynchronously gets the value of the specified column as the requested type.

returns.span: 包含指定列的值的任务。

span.span: A task whose contains the value of the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当在顺序模式下创建读取器时, 才需要此异步方法来避免阻塞调用线程。This asynchronous method is only needed to avoid blocking the calling thread when the reader is created in sequential mode. 如果未指定顺序模式, 则每次 ReadAsync 完成时, 所有列值都将在内存中可用, 并且调用该方法的同步版本不应阻止调用线程。If sequential mode isn't specified, all column values should become available in memory each time ReadAsync completes, and calling the synchronous version of the method shouldn't block the calling thread. 此异步方法的默认实现调用其同步对应项, 并返回已完成的任务, 可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method invokes its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed Task, potentially blocking the calling thread. 如果传递了已取消的取消标记, 则默认实现还会返回已取消的任务。The default implementation also returns a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 该方法可用于请求操作之前接受取消标记。This method accepts a cancellation token that can be used to request the operation to be cancelled early. 实现可能会忽略该请求。Implementations may ignore this request. 当返回任务还未完成时， DbDataReader 对象的其他方法和属性不应调用 。Other methods and properties of the DbDataReader object should not be invoked while the returned Task is not yet completed.

exception.span: 在数据检索期间删除或关闭连接。

span.span: The connection was dropped or closed during data retrieval.
-or-

exception.span: 在数据检索期间关闭数据读取器。

span.span: The data reader was closed during the data retrieval.
-or-

exception.span: 没有可读取的数据（例如尚未调用第一个 ，或调用返回了 ）。

span.span: There is no data ready to be read (for example, the first hasn't been called, or it returned ).
-or-

exception.span: 按顺序模式尝试读取上一步骤中读取的列。

span.span: Tried to read a previously-read column in sequential mode.
-or-

exception.span: 没有正在进行的异步操作。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可在调用类型为 Get_ \* _ 方法 (例如 、等) 前检查是否有空列值, 以避免引发异常。Call this method to check for null column values before calling the typed Get_\*_ methods (for example, , , and so on) to avoid throwing an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> IsDBNullAsync(int32 ordinal) cil managed
Public Function IsDBNullAsync (ordinal As Integer) As Task(Of Boolean)

param.name: ordinal
param.span: 从零开始的要检索的列。

span.span: The zero-based column to be retrieved.

summary.span: 异步获取一个值，该值指示列中是否包含不存在的或缺少的值。

span.span: Asynchronously gets a value that indicates whether the column contains non-existent or missing values.

returns.span: 一个 ，如果指定的列值等于 ，则其 属性为 ，如果不等于，则为 。

span.span: A whose property is if the specified column value is equivalent to or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当在顺序模式下创建读取器时, 才需要此异步方法来避免阻塞调用线程。This asynchronous method is only needed to avoid blocking the calling thread when the reader is created in sequential mode. 如果未指定顺序模式, 则每次 ReadAsync 完成时, 所有列值都将在内存中可用, 并且调用该方法的同步版本不应阻止调用线程。If sequential mode isn't specified, all column values should become available in memory each time ReadAsync completes, and calling the synchronous version of the method shouldn't block the calling thread. 此异步方法的默认实现调用其同步对应项, 并返回已完成的任务, 可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method invokes its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed Task, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 当返回任务还未完成时， DbDataReader 对象的其他方法和属性不应调用 。Other methods and properties of the DbDataReader object should not be invoked while the returned Task is not yet completed.

-or-

-or-

span.span: Trying to read a previously read column in sequential mode.
-or-

span.span: There was an asynchronous operation in progress.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> IsDBNullAsync(int32 ordinal, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: virtual System::Threading::Tasks::Task<bool> ^ IsDBNullAsync(int ordinal, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

abstract member IsDBNullAsync : int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<bool> override this.IsDBNullAsync : int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<bool>

param.name: ordinal
param.span: 从零开始的要检索的列。

span.span: The zero-based column to be retrieved.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用于取消异步操作的令牌。

span.span: A token to cancel the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 异步获取一个值，该值指示列中是否包含不存在的或缺少的值。

span.span: Asynchronously gets a value that indicates whether the column contains non-existent or missing values.

returns.span: 一个 ，如果指定的列值等于 ，则其 属性为 ，如果不等于，则为 。

span.span: A whose property is if the specified column value is equivalent to or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当在顺序模式下创建读取器时, 才需要此异步方法来避免阻塞调用线程。This asynchronous method is only needed to avoid blocking the calling thread when the reader is created in sequential mode. 如果未指定顺序模式, 则每次 ReadAsync 完成时, 所有列值都将在内存中可用, 并且调用该方法的同步版本不应阻止调用线程。If sequential mode isn't specified, all column values should become available in memory each time ReadAsync completes, and calling the synchronous version of the method shouldn't block the calling thread. 此异步方法的默认实现调用其同步对应项, 并返回已完成的任务, 可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method invokes its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed Task, potentially blocking the calling thread. 如果传递了已取消的取消标记, 则默认实现还会返回已取消的任务。The default implementation also returns a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 该方法可用于请求操作之前接受取消标记。This method accepts a cancellation token that can be used to request the operation to be cancelled early. 实现可能会忽略该请求。Implementations may ignore this request. 当返回任务还未完成时， DbDataReader 对象的其他方法和属性不应调用 。Other methods and properties of the DbDataReader object should not be invoked while the returned Task is not yet completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现调用其同步对应项, 并返回已完成的任务, 可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method invokes its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed Task, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 当返回任务还未完成时， DbDataReader 对象的其他方法和属性不应调用 。Other methods and properties of the DbDataReader object should not be invoked while the returned Task is not yet completed.

span.span: The cancellation instruction.

summary.span: 在读取一批语句的结果时，使读取器异步前进到下一个结果。

span.span: Asynchronously advances the reader to the next result when reading the results of a batch of statements.

returns.span: 一个 ，如果有更多的结果集，则其 属性为 ，如果没有，则为 。

span.span: A whose property is if there are more result sets or if there aren't.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现调用其同步对应项, 并返回已完成的任务, 可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method invokes its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed Task, potentially blocking the calling thread. 如果传递了已取消的取消标记, 则默认实现还会返回已取消的任务。The default implementation also returns a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 该方法可用于请求操作之前接受取消标记。This method accepts a cancellation token that can be used to request the operation to be cancelled early. 实现可能会忽略该请求。Implementations may ignore this request. 当返回任务还未完成时， DbDataReader 对象的其他方法和属性不应调用 。Other methods and properties of the DbDataReader object should not be invoked while the returned Task is not yet completed.

exception.span: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

span.span: An error occurred while executing the command text.
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Read() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Read () As Boolean

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将读取器前移至结果集中的下一条记录。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, advances the reader to the next record in a result set.

returns.span: 如果存在更多行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there are more rows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据读取器的默认位置处于第一条记录之前。The default position of a data reader is before the first record. 因此, 您必须调用以开始访问数据。Therefore, you must call to begin accessing data.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 使读取器异步前进到结果集中的下一条记录。

span.span: Asynchronously advances the reader to the next record in a result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关异步编程的详细信息, 请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RecordsAffected As Integer
public: abstract property int RecordsAffected { int get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取通过执行 SQL 语句而更改、插入或删除的行数。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 更改、插入或删除的行数。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

value.span: 对于 SELECT 语句为 -1；如果没影响任何行或该语句失败，则为 0。

span.span: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在`RecordsAffected`读取所有行并`DataReader`关闭之前, 不会设置属性。The `RecordsAffected` property is not set until all rows are read and you close the `DataReader`.

para.span: 应实现此属性, 以便在读取器关闭时返回值。

span.span: This property and should be implemented to return a value when the reader is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property VisibleFieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int VisibleFieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 中未隐藏的字段的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of fields in the that are not hidden.
The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于确定 中的可见字段的数目。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，对分部主键执行 SELECT 将以隐藏字段的形式返回该键的其余部分。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隐藏的字段始终追加在可见字段之后。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview
